quest.name: Where the Sun Don't Shine
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol needs a little light in her life.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid flint stones in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid flint stones to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid seeds in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid seeds to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid trout in the Red ChaliceDeliver the splendid trout to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The underground caverns we explore are terribly dark places. Without some manner of illumination, we couldn't see our own whiskers, never mind go about our digging.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Would you be so kind, good madamsir, as to mine for me some flint in the K'mul Astropolis? The stones are necessary for striking a fire. Three or so should suffice splendidly.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Would you be so kind, good madamsir, as to gather for me some plant seeds in the K'mul Astropolis? From them we can extract an oil which we use as lamp fuel. Three bags' worth should suffice splendidly.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Would you be so kind, good madamsir, as to catch for me a trout in the Red Chalice? From them we can extract an oil which we use as lamp fuel.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh, there you are. May I ask how the flint stones are coming along? You'll have the best luck searching in the K'mul Astropolis.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh, there you are. May I ask how the seeds are coming along? You'll have the best luck searching in the K'mul Astropolis.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh, there you are. May I ask how the trout is coming along? You'll have the best luck searching in the Red Chalice.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Welcome back, MistressMaster Forename. Dare I hope you've obtained that which I seek?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, splendid! This shall serve us well for several outings!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: As you may have heard, we Qitari do not see as well as some other peoples, and must rely on such things to help us find our way in the dark. For this gift of sight, you have my heartfelt thanks.
